actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology and Competitiveness.

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration and the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to jointly conduct a research program to develop new technologies for quieter jet aircraft engines and airframes.
short_title: Aircraft Noise Research and Abatement Act of 1992

summary.text: Aircraft Noise Research and Abatement Act of 1992 - Directs the Administrators of the Federal Aviation Administration and of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to conduct a joint research program to develop by the year 2000 new technologies for quieter subsonic jet aircraft engines and airframes. Authorizes appropriations. Requires an annual progress report to the Congress.

titles.title: Aircraft Noise Research and Abatement Act of 1992

To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration and the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to jointly conduct a research program to develop new technologies for quieter jet aircraft engines and airframes.
